name: add_succ

text.english: \(\texttt{add}\) of an \(\mathcal{N}Term\) and the succesor of another \(\mathcal{N}Term\) equals the successor of the sum of them: \[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(n, S(m)) = S(add(n,m)) \]
text.italiano: \(\texttt{add}\) di un qualsiasi \(\mathcal{N}Term\) e il succesore di un'altro \(\mathcal{N}Term\) equivale al succesore della somma di essi: \[ \forall n \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{add}(n, S(m)) = S(add(n,m)) \]

coq:
Theorem add_succ: forall n m : nterm , add n (S m) = S (add n m).
Proof.
Admitted.
